PHRASE.LANG: Lead guitarist, Tears, seems to think her outfit suits any engagement. Bundle includes headdress, jacket, trousers, and boots. [#Legal]
Guitariste solo, Tears a l'air de penser que sa tenue convient à toutes les occasions. Ce pack inclut une coiffure, une veste, un pantalon et des bottes. [#Legal]
Leadgitarristin "Tears" glaubt, dass ihre Kleidung zu jedem Anlass passt. Das Paket umfasst Maske und Frisur, Jacke, Hose und Stiefel. [#Legal]
La chitarrista solista, Tears, sembra pensare che il suo abito si adatti a ogni occasione. Il pacchetto include acconciatura, giacca, pantaloni e stivali. [#Legal]
Parece que la guitarrista Tears opina que su atuendo va bien para cualquier compromiso. El conjunto comprende tocado, chaqueta, pantalones y botas. [#Legal]
Lead guitarist, Tears, seems to think her outfit suits any engagement. Bundle includes headdress, jacket, pants, and boots. [#Legal]
